Author: melly_the_elephant
Text: I've been working through Part A of this workbook:  https://www.cci.health.wa.gov.au/Resources/For-Clinicians/Eating-Disorders  It's definitely helping. I still binge/purge/restrict but writing about it all is helping a lot. It's not written in a judgemental way either. It's a lot of reading and I did think "I know all this" to begin with but it's been worth the effort
